column2:
"Hm? Oh, it's you. Apologies for not noticing.
It seems I was lost in thought."

"My time here on Amduskia has only served
to reinforce my awe of the indomitability of life."

"Every part of the dragorii body is suited to
survival amidst the harsh conditions of this
environment. It's a triumph of evolution."

"They saw the need to burrow, so they burrowed,
just as they saw the need to fly and took wing."

"Evolution is not a conscious decision, yet it is
still a response to the instinctive wish of all
life to perpetuate itself. To endure."

"Over eons, physical change answers that wish.
And now, I have the chance to commune with
the products of that incredible process."

"Ours is a time of war, and of suffering and loss,
but that only makes that wish for survival burn
all the brighter."

"I want peace as much as the next person, but
for now, I'm very grateful to have been born
into this era and to study the life it holds."

"……ああ、キミか。
いや、気付くのが遅れてすまないね。
少しばかり呆けていたようだ。"

"この、アムドゥスキアに来て
龍族を見て、私は改めて思うよ。
生命というのは逞しいものだな、と。"

"彼らの持つ身体のすべてが
この過酷な環境で生存するための
適切な進化と考えると、感慨深い。"

"彼らは彼らで思ったのだろう。
地に潜らねばならぬから、潜り
空を飛ばねばならぬから、飛んだ。"

"進化のきっかけは
常に生命による願望だ。
長い時を経て、願いに身体が応える。"

"そしてその進化を遂げた存在と
交流し、意見を交わせるこの幸せ。
……感無量と言わずにはいられないな。"

"確かに今、この時代は戦いにまみれ
大変な時期であることは間違いない。"

"それでも私は、この時代に生まれ落ち
生命を探る学者でいられることに
感謝しているよ。"
